Translation:
why track a regular piece with leads and chord progression? join the grey mass? instead of doing a regular track i offer you to join the cystic world of rhe_.  
inspired by autechre's 'chiastic skude' and incorporating ideas that  waited so long to be laid down on tracks.  Here it is - 100% pure '_chre'.
